cause.description:
As everyone knows, Alby loves his beer. So everyone be generous and add to funding his favourite pastime - drinking. This will make him very happy and also very drunk. So come on everyone, fuck the starving kids in Africa, fuck the whales and fuck people with aids, getting Alby drunk is a far more worthy cause. You know it makes sense.
1. Alby loves beer.
2. Alby loves getting drunk.
cause.mission: Get Alby totally hammered courtesy of his friends on facebook
cause.name: Alby's beer fund
